name: Operation Ocean (Zinkenite, castlebbs)
description:
You are a marine biologist who is investigating a radioactivity report. You find out that there was a radioactive leak from a nuclear plant in underwater caves. Radioactive barrels have been lost and some sea creatures got contaminated.

You need to go into the caves in a submarine, escape the dangers and spray the contaminated sea creatures to heal them and the barrels to destroy them.

Controls

You play this game with the mouse. 
- Left click to move
- Right click to spray the serum
- Press E to turn On/Off the submarine light 

Instructions

Can you make it through the 4 unique cave levels!

Navigate through the caves to lower the radiation level from the radioactive leak.

 - Clean the sea creatures    

 - Find barrels to destroy 

Don't forget to refill your oxygen  

An be careful of the obstacles !  

Credits

Zinkenite: Coding + Art
Castlebbs: Music
Woosis: Testing
Gigi: Little help with art
